title: How does BLOCKSURANCE work?
description: 1) Stake 4SURE token. / 2) Create a Vault for the ERC20 token you want to insure. / 3) Deposit your tokens to vault and recieve instant coverage.

title: What problem is BLOCKSURANCE solving?
description: We are helping investors into the Ethereum ecosystem protect their investments from loss.

title: How many tokens does BLOCKSURANCE support?
description: BLOCKSURANCE supports more than 100 tokens./ Login to the app to see the full list.

title: Why does the registration cost money?
description: Our dApp is 100 % on-chain. When you register, data is recorded to the ethereum blockchain. Ethereum gas fees apply here.

title: How much does it cost to register?
description: Depending on what the ethereum gas fees are at the time, around $20 on average.

title: Who owns individual Vault contracts?
description: The creator of each Vault is designated as the owner and has full control of the contract.

title: What is the maximum insurable value per token?
What is the fee charged for depositing tokens?
description: BLOCKSURANCE charges 0.005 ETH, plus 2% of deposited tokens.

title: Why do you charge 2% fee on insurance Vaults?
description: BLOCKSURANCE's fee structure is designed to deliver optimal value for our clients. We guarantee payouts in case of an incident.

title: How much 4SURE do I need to stake to qualify for coverage?
description: Minimal 4SURE stake is 20,000 tokens/ during IDO  this was about $1K | 0.3 ETH

title: How many Vaults can I start?
description: You can start as many Vaults as you want.

title: When can I withdraw tokens from my Vault?
description: You can withdraw your token from a Vault at any time. /Withdrawing tokens will void your coverage for that particular Vault.

title: What is the minimal lockup period for a 4SURE stake?
description: Minimal staking period for 4SURE is 90 days.

title: What APR can I expect to recieve for staking 4SURE?
description: 180 days or less: 21%/ 360 days or less: 33%/ more than a year: 45%

title: What rewards do you offer to partners for refferal?
description: 0.5% on vault deposits/  5% rewards on staking
